heroSubtitle: All government schemes, jobs, and services at your fingertips. Simple, fast, and reliable.
featureServicesWeOfferDescription: We provide a wide range of government services to cater to your needs.
featureForIndidualsDescription: Access essential services like job applications, scheme registrations, and more.
featureForStudentsDescription: Find scholarships, educational resources, and student services.
featureForFarmersDescription: Get access to agricultural schemes, subsidies, and resources.
featureForBusinessesDescription: Find what the government has to offer you as a business owner for their growth.
writerSummaryPlaceholder: Start writing to see a summary...
writerThumbnailPlaceholder: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select a file
BloglistDescription: Read our latest insights and updates on government schemes, jobs, and services.
BloglistNoPosts: No blog posts found. Please check back later.
BlogLastDateDescription: The last date to apply for this scheme or job.
BlogLastDateExpired: This scheme or job has expired.
BlogStartDateDescription: The date when this scheme or job application starts.
footerDescription: Your one-stop portal for government services, schemes, and opportunities. Making access simple and transparent for every citizen.
messageBlogDraftSaved: Blog post saved as draft successfully.
messageBlogDeletedError: Error deleting blog post. Please try again later.
messageBlogNotFound: Blog post not found. It may have been deleted or does not exist.
messageBlogImageRequired: Featured image is required for the blog post.
messageBlogError: An error occurred while creating the blog post. Please try again later.
messageBlogUnauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
messageBlogAccessDenied: You do not have access to this blog post.
messageBlogInvalidData: Invalid data. Please fill all required fields.
messageBlogImageUploadError: Error uploading the image. Please try again.
messageBlogImageSizeError: Image size exceeds the allowed limit. Please upload a smaller image.
messageBlogImageFormatError: Invalid image format. Please upload a JPEG or PNG image.
messageBlogSummaryError: Error generating summary. Please try again later.
messageBlogImageInvalid: Invalid image. Please use JPEG, PNG, or GIF format.
